title: Better off Dead book 1
description: An assassination attempt is made on the life of Hip Hop Mogul Charles St Claire. Through divine intervention his life is spared but before he can seek retribution for the assault on his friends and family, he must do the bidding of the Archangel Michael. A battle has resumed for the souls of men and Charles St Claire has found himself right in the middle of it. He will travel to the bowels of Hell and back to restore the balance and protect humanity.
author: James Lee Nathan III
